recipe.title: Berry Compote with Crispy Won Ton Strips and Vanilla Ice Cream
ingredients: 1 cup blackberries, halved lengthwise if large
1 tablespoon crème de cassis or Chambord liqueur
1 to 2 cups vegetable oil for frying
8 won ton wrappers, thawed if frozen, cut into 1/4-inch-wide strips
instructions: Combine berries in a large bowl. Heat wine, crème de cassis, and sugar in a small heavy saucepan, stirring, until sugar is dissolved, then pour over berries. Toss gently and let stand 10 minutes.

Fry won ton strips while compote is standing: Heat 1/2 inch oil in a heavy skillet over moderate heat until a won ton strip sizzles when added. Fry strips in 2 or 3 batches, stirring gently with a slotted spoon, until golden, about 30 seconds. Drain on paper towels. Top compote with ice cream, then won ton strips.

Heat 1/2 inch oil in a heavy skillet over moderate heat until a won ton strip sizzles when added. Fry strips in 2 or 3 batches, stirring gently with a slotted spoon, until golden, about 30 seconds. Drain on paper towels.
Top compote with ice cream, then won ton strips.
